Ok. So we are all on the same page…

1.  You don’t have a P2PE validated solution.
2.  Your semi-integrated product, which includes out-of-scope components,
    a.  Uses our validated P2PE solution in UTG
    b.  Uses Mercury's out-of-scope solution
    c.  Uses your (Card Connect) out-of-scope solution

You have acknowledged that you can't use the P2PE validated solution outside of UTG, which
means you are going to perform a data cleanse and cease and desist from representing
anything to do with a Card Connect P2PE validated solution… especially marketing
materials that indicate such.

If all of the above is true, say "Yes."
If there any differences, please respond by number.

We will do the right things by our customers and partners and appreciate the same.
